title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, August 29, 2021
description: Today is the birthday of Karen Hesse (1952). Published her first book “Wish on a Unicorn” at age 39 and won the 1998 Newbery Medal for her book “Out of the Dust.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
